info.description: This is the documentation for the Placio Application Api
info.title: Placio Application Api

post.description: Create a new account and assign the user to it

get.description: Get the list of accounts following the specified account
Get the list of accounts the specified account is following

post.description: Authenticate a user and return an access token
Create a new comment for the specified post

get.description: Retrieve all comments for the specified post
get.summary: List all comments for a post

get.description: Retrieve a comment by its ID

put.description: Update a comment by its ID

delete.description: Delete a comment by its ID

post.description: Add a like to a post

delete.description: Remove a like from a post

get.description: Retrieve the number of likes for a post
get.summary: Get like count for a post

post.description: Upload a media file (image, gif, or video) for a post

get.description: Retrieve all media for the specified post
get.summary: List all media for a post

post.description: Create a new post for the authenticated user

get.description: Retrieve a post by its ID

put.description: Update a post by its ID

delete.description: Delete a post by its ID

put.description: Update an existing user by ID
put.summary: Update an existing user by ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of bookings for a specific user by ID
get.summary: Retrieve a list of bookings for a specific user by ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of conversations a specific user is a participant in by ID
get.summary: Retrieve a list of conversations a specific user is a participant in by ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of groups a specific user is a member of by ID
get.summary: Retrieve a list of groups a specific user is a member of by ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of messages received by a specific user by ID
get.summary: Retrieve a list of messages received by a specific user by ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of messages sent by a specific user by ID
get.summary: Retrieve a list of messages sent by a specific user by ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of notifications for a specific user by ID
get.summary: Retrieve a list of notifications for a specific user by ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of payments for a specific user by ID
get.summary: Retrieve a list of payments for a specific user by ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of voice notes a specific user is a participant in by ID
get.summary: Retrieve a list of voice notes a specific user is a participant in by ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of voice notes received by a specific user by ID
get.summary: Retrieve a list of voice notes received by a specific user by ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of voice notes sent by a specific user by ID
get.summary: Retrieve a list of voice notes sent by a specific user by ID

get.description: Retrieve a specific voice note by ID
get.summary: Retrieve a specific voice note by ID
